message: Let's be fair and take 60% for me and 40% for you.
I understand you wanting a larger share, but let's be realistic. This offer is fair considering the time pressure.
I'll meet you halfway between my previous offer and yours.
Alice, we're running out of time.  This offer is a compromise, meeting you closer to your desired share.
Getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is more than generous considering the time constraint and your diminishing returns. Take it or leave it.
I'll take a smaller increase this time, but I still think I can get a bit more.
Alice, this is my final offer. Take this offer, or I'm going to start playing hardball. We both lose if this goes on much longer.
